mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board(title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer});
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, updatedate = now(), content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where bno>0 order by bno desc
select * from tbl_board where bno>0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pageNum};
